mapper.select: SELECT ri_id AS riId, ri_type AS riType, ri_name AS riName, ri_desc AS riDesc, ri_person AS riPerson, ri_maxperson AS riMaxperson, ri_area AS riArea, ri_bed AS riBed, ri_bedcnt AS riBedcnt, ri_price AS riPrice, ri_bedroom AS riBedroom, ri_bathroom AS riBathroom, ri_show AS riShow FROM t_room_info WHERE si_id = #{siId} AND ri_id = #{riId}
SELECT f.fi_id AS fiId, f.fi_name AS fiName, f.fi_icon AS fiIcon FROM t_facility_info f JOIN t_room_facility_rel rfr ON f.fi_id = rfr.fi_id WHERE rfr.ri_id = #{riId} AND rfr.si_id = #{siId}
SELECT a.ai_idx AS aiIdx, a.ra_name AS raName FROM t_amenities_info a JOIN t_room_amenities ra ON a.ai_idx = ra.ai_idx WHERE ra.si_id = #{siId} AND ra.ri_id = #{riId}

SELECT ri_id AS riId, ri_type AS riType, ri_name AS riName, ri_desc AS riDesc, ri_person AS riPerson, ri_maxperson AS riMaxperson, ri_area AS riArea, ri_bed AS riBed, ri_bedcnt AS riBedcnt, ri_price AS riPrice, ri_bedroom AS riBedroom, ri_bathroom AS riBathroom FROM t_room_info WHERE si_id = #{siId} AND ri_id != #{riId}
SELECT ai_idx AS aiIdx, ra_name AS raName FROM t_amenities_info ORDER BY ai_idx
SELECT sp_idx AS spIdx, sp_url AS spUrl, si_id AS siId, ri_id AS riId FROM t_room_photo WHERE si_id = #{siId} AND ri_id = #{riId} ORDER BY sp_idx
SELECT sp_idx AS spIdx, sp_url AS spUrl, si_id AS siId, ri_id AS riId FROM t_room_photo WHERE si_id = #{siId} AND sp_idx = 0
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(ri_id), 0) + 1 FROM t_room_info WHERE si_id = #{siId}
INSERT INTO t_room_info ( si_id, ri_id, ri_type, ri_name, ri_desc, ri_person, ri_maxperson, ri_area, ri_bed, ri_bedcnt, ri_price, ri_bedroom, ri_bathroom, ri_show, ri_delete, ri_date ) VALUES ( #{siId}, #{riId}, #{riType}, #{riName}, #{riDesc}, #{riPerson}, #{riMaxperson}, #{riArea}, #{riBed}, #{riBedcnt}, #{riPrice}, #{riBedroom}, #{riBathroom}, #{riShow}, #{riDelete}, SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO t_room_facility_rel (si_id, ri_id, fi_id) VALUES (#{siId}, #{riId}, #{fiId})
INSERT INTO t_room_amenities (si_id, ri_id, ai_idx) VALUES (#{siId}, #{riId}, #{aiIdx, jdbcType=INTEGER})
INSERT INTO t_room_photo (si_id, ri_id, sp_idx, sp_url) VALUES (#{siId}, #{riId}, #{spIdx}, #{spUrl})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_room_info SET ri_type = #{riType}, ri_name = #{riName}, ri_desc = #{riDesc}, ri_person = #{riPerson}, ri_maxperson = #{riMaxperson}, ri_area = #{riArea}, ri_bed = #{riBed}, ri_bedcnt = #{riBedcnt}, ri_price = #{riPrice}, ri_show = #{riShow}, ri_bedroom = #{riBedroom}, ri_bathroom = #{riBathroom} WHERE si_id = #{siId} AND ri_id = #{riId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_room_facility_rel WHERE si_id = #{siId} AND ri_id = #{riId}
DELETE FROM t_room_amenities WHERE si_id = #{siId} AND ri_id = #{riId}
mapper.select: WITH reserved_dates AS ( SELECT sr_checkin + LEVEL - 1 AS reserved_date FROM t_stay_reservation WHERE si_id = #{siId} AND ri_id = #{riId} AND sr_status = 'a' CONNECT BY LEVEL <= sr_checkout - sr_checkin AND PRIOR sr_id = sr_id AND PRIOR DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE IS NOT NULL ) SELECT reserved_date FROM reserved_dates WHERE reserved_date > TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY reserved_date

SELECT DISTINCT sr_checkin AS checkout_only_date FROM t_stay_reservation WHERE si_id = #{siId} AND ri_id = #{riId} AND sr_status = 'a' AND sr_checkin NOT IN ( SELECT sr_checkout FROM t_stay_reservation WHERE si_id = #{siId} AND ri_id = #{riId} AND sr_status = 'a' ) AND sr_checkin > TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY checkout_only_date
